1568040.name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 11
1568040.description:
Help Rangers run Pinecreek Hills & the National Academy

Spend a sensational Summer helping the famous Park Rangers run Pinecreek Hills & the National Parks Academy.

Become a Volunteer Ranger. Organise events on beautiful lakes, rivers and trails. Ride Pinecreek’s awesome Centennial Railroad. Learn about Wildlife. Camp and Picnic beside Bluewaters Lake. Explore atmospheric Waterfalls, Caves, enchanted Gorges and Gorgeous outdoor locations. Enjoy fabulous scenery, have Campfires, spot Bears, Deer and Eagles. See Pinecreek’s historic buildings and landmarks. Supervise the National Academy’s recruitment & training programs.

Play great Hogs & Puzzles, Spot 100’s of Animals, Birds, Fish and Wildlife. Protect the environment, get Souvenirs and Awards along the way.
